alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:44AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Stone, Van Buren, western Cleburne, northeastern Conway and northeastern Faulkner Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Claude... Cleveland... Catholic Point... Middleton... Lanty... Fairbanks... Whipple... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Blick... Old Lexington... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
